example_sentence_english: I want to speak with you.

example_sentence_italian: I dialetti parlati qui sono tanti.
example_sentence_english: The spoken dialects here are many.

example_sentence_italian: Le lingue parlate in città sono molte.
example_sentence_english: The languages spoken in the city are many.
I often spoke with my grandmother.

translation_english: he was speaking/she was speaking/you (formal) were speaking

example_sentence_english: You (plural) talked about work every day.
They always spoke in a low voice.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'parlato'
example_sentence_english: I have spoken with the boss.
